neighborhoods.name: Old Town (Staré Město)
neighborhoods.character: The historic heart of Liberec with beautiful 19th-century architecture and the iconic Town Hall.

location.description: Located in the center of Liberec, surrounding the main square and Town Hall.

history.overview: The original settlement of Liberec, developed as a textile manufacturing center in the 19th century.
history.significance: Home to the magnificent Town Hall and historic market square, the commercial heart of the city.
notable_events: Textile industry boom in the 19th century

practical_info.safety: Very safe with regular police presence and tourist activity.
practical_info.best_time_to_visit: Year-round, especially during festivals and markets.
practical_info.walkability: Excellent with pedestrian-friendly streets and squares.

attractions.name: Liberec Town Hall
attractions.description: Magnificent Neo-Renaissance town hall with 65-meter tower and ornate facade.
attractions.appeal: One of the most beautiful town halls in Central Europe with guided tours available.

attractions.name: Regional Gallery
attractions.description: Housed in a beautiful Art Nouveau building with Czech and European art collections.
attractions.appeal: Impressive collection of glass art reflecting the region's glassmaking tradition.

attractions.name: Main Square
attractions.description: Historic triangular square surrounded by 19th-century merchant houses.
attractions.appeal: Perfect for people-watching and experiencing local festivals and markets.

dining.name: Hostinec U Fleku
dining.known_for: Authentic Czech pub food and local beers

dining.name: Café Central
dining.known_for: Traditional coffee culture and Czech pastries

activities.name: Town Hall Tower Climb
activities.description: Climb the tower for panoramic views of Liberec and the surrounding mountains.

activities.name: Market Day Shopping
activities.description: Visit the weekly farmers market for local produce and crafts.

stay_here_if: You want to be in the heart of historic Liberec
You enjoy traditional architecture and local culture
insider_tips: Visit the Town Hall early morning for the best photo opportunities.
Attend the Christmas market in December for a magical atmosphere.

neighborhoods.name: Harcov
neighborhoods.character: A peaceful residential area known for its beautiful dam reservoir and recreational opportunities.

location.description: Located east of the city center, surrounding the Harcov Dam reservoir.

history.overview: Developed in the early 20th century around the Harcov Dam, built for water supply and recreation.
history.significance: Important water reservoir and popular recreational area for locals.

practical_info.safety: Very safe residential area with families and outdoor activities.
practical_info.best_time_to_visit: Spring and summer for outdoor activities and lakeside dining.
practical_info.walkability: Good with scenic walking paths around the reservoir.

attractions.name: Harcov Dam
attractions.description: Beautiful artificial lake surrounded by walking paths and recreational areas.
attractions.appeal: Perfect for walking, cycling, and enjoying peaceful nature near the city.

attractions.name: Rybářská bašta Restaurant
attractions.description: Elegant restaurant with panoramic views of the reservoir and mountains.
attractions.appeal: Exceptional lakeside dining with local specialties and beautiful sunset views.

attractions.name: Harcov Park
attractions.description: Peaceful park with playgrounds and walking trails around the reservoir.
attractions.appeal: Ideal for family outings and relaxing nature walks.

dining.name: Rybářská bašta
dining.known_for: Pan-seared trout and venison with mountain views

dining.name: Café Harcov
dining.known_for: Coffee and light meals with reservoir views

activities.name: Lakeside Walking
activities.description: Enjoy scenic walks around the Harcov reservoir with mountain views.

activities.name: Sunset Dining
activities.description: Dine at Rybářská bašta during sunset for spectacular views.

stay_here_if: You enjoy peaceful nature and outdoor activities
You want beautiful mountain and lake views
avoid_if: You prefer urban nightlife and shopping
You need easy access to public transportation
insider_tips: Visit during sunset for the most beautiful reservoir views.
Combine a visit with a trip to Ještěd Mountain for a full day of outdoor activities.

neighborhoods.name: Ještěd
neighborhoods.character: The iconic mountain area dominated by the futuristic Ještěd Tower, offering spectacular views and outdoor activities.

location.description: Located on Ještěd Mountain at 1,012 meters above sea level, accessible by cable car or road.

history.overview: The mountain has been a landmark for centuries, with the iconic tower built in the 1960s by architect Karel Hubáček.
history.significance: UNESCO-protected architectural gem and symbol of Liberec, combining hotel, restaurant, and television transmitter.

practical_info.safety: Very safe with well-maintained facilities and emergency services.
practical_info.best_time_to_visit: Year-round; summer for hiking, winter for skiing, clear days for best views.
practical_info.walkability: Limited due to mountain terrain, but excellent hiking trails available.

attractions.name: Ještěd Tower
attractions.description: Futuristic hyperboloid tower with hotel, restaurant, and panoramic views.
attractions.appeal: UNESCO-protected architectural masterpiece with 360-degree views of northern Bohemia.

attractions.name: Cable Car
attractions.description: Scenic cable car ride from Liberec to the mountain top.
attractions.appeal: Breathtaking views during the ascent and descent.

attractions.name: Ski Resort
attractions.description: Local ski area with slopes for various skill levels.
attractions.appeal: Accessible skiing with beautiful mountain scenery.

dining.name: Hotel Ještěd Restaurant
dining.known_for: Duck breast and local game with mountain views
dining.atmosphere: Futuristic tower setting with panoramic views

dining.name: Mountain Huts
dining.known_for: Mountain goulash and hot mulled wine

activities.name: Mountain Hiking
activities.description: Explore hiking trails with stunning views of the Jizera Mountains.

activities.name: Skiing and Snowboarding
activities.description: Enjoy skiing and snowboarding with local mountain views.

stay_here_if: You want to experience the iconic Ještěd Tower
You enjoy mountain activities and spectacular views
insider_tips: Visit on clear days for the best panoramic views of northern Bohemia.
Book the hotel restaurant in advance for special occasions.

neighborhoods.name: Babylon
neighborhoods.character: Modern entertainment and shopping complex with aquapark, shopping center, and family attractions.

location.description: Located in the southern part of Liberec, easily accessible by car and public transport.

history.overview: Developed in the 1990s as a modern entertainment and shopping complex.
history.significance: Major regional entertainment destination combining shopping, water park, and family activities.
notable_events: Development of aquapark and entertainment facilities

practical_info.safety: Very safe with security and family-friendly environment.
practical_info.best_time_to_visit: Year-round; weekends can be crowded with families.
practical_info.walkability: Good within the complex, but requires transport to reach.

attractions.name: Aquapark Babylon
attractions.description: Indoor water park with pools, slides, and tropical environment.
attractions.appeal: Year-round water activities perfect for families and relaxation.

attractions.name: Babylon Shopping Center
attractions.description: Large shopping center with international and local brands.
attractions.appeal: Comprehensive shopping experience with dining and entertainment options.

attractions.name: Entertainment Zone
attractions.description: Various entertainment options including bowling and arcade games.
attractions.appeal: Perfect for family outings and group activities.

dining.name: Food Court
dining.known_for: Variety of international cuisines and Czech fast food

activities.name: Water Park Fun
activities.description: Enjoy pools, slides, and tropical environment year-round.

activities.name: Shopping Spree
activities.description: Explore the large shopping center with various international and local brands.

stay_here_if: You enjoy modern entertainment and shopping
avoid_if: You prefer historic or cultural experiences
insider_tips: Visit on weekdays to avoid weekend crowds at the aquapark.
Combine shopping with water park activities for a full day of entertainment.

neighborhoods.name: Rochlice
neighborhoods.character: A quiet residential area with university facilities, parks, and local community atmosphere.

location.description: Located southwest of the city center, primarily residential with some commercial areas.

history.overview: Developed as a residential area in the 20th century, home to the Technical University of Liberec.
history.significance: Educational hub with university facilities and peaceful residential environment.

practical_info.safety: Very safe residential area with student population and families.
practical_info.best_time_to_visit: Year-round; academic year brings student activity.
practical_info.walkability: Good with parks and pedestrian-friendly areas.

attractions.name: Technical University of Liberec
attractions.description: Modern university campus with engineering and technical programs.
attractions.appeal: Educational hub with international student programs and research facilities.

attractions.name: Rochlice Park
attractions.description: Peaceful park with walking paths and recreational areas.
attractions.appeal: Perfect for quiet walks and family outings.

attractions.name: Residential Areas
attractions.description: Well-maintained residential neighborhoods with family homes.
attractions.appeal: Quiet, safe environment for families and students.

dining.name: Local Pubs
dining.known_for: Traditional Czech dishes and local beers

activities.name: Campus Exploration
activities.description: Visit the modern university campus and facilities.

activities.name: Park Walking
activities.description: Enjoy peaceful walks in Rochlice Park.

stay_here_if: You're a student or visiting the university
avoid_if: You seek tourist attractions and nightlife
You want to be in the city center
insider_tips: Visit during the academic year to experience student life and campus activities.
Explore the local parks for peaceful walks away from city crowds.
